name: Escaping Square - Web Player
description:
A short game about a square that doesn't want to become a platform. This is the web player version of Escaping Square. For the downloadable version, see 'Escaping Square - Download Version'. The link is:

https://shaun-d-white.itch.io/escaping-square-down...

Gameplay Information:
- 3D autorunner with prodecually (randomly) generated platforms.
- Jump from platform to platform
- Numeroues goals to achieve
- Numeroues modifiers to change how you play

Controls:
Press the 'jump' button to jump

NOTE:
Unity web player won't work in Google Chrome, so use either Internet Explorer or Firefox. You may have to install Unity web player if you haven't already.
